Text: Boston Partners grew its stake in shares of Travelers Companies by 133.3% in the second quarter. Boston Partners now owns 4,072,444 shares of the insurance provider's stock worth $609,075,000 after acquiring an additional 2,326,784 shares during the last quarter.
